item.title: Menu Depth
item.description: Deep Depth Folder Structure userguide ├── Depth - 1 │ ├── _index.md │ ├── Depth - 2 │ │ ├── _index.md │ │ ├── Depth - 3 │ │ │ ├── _index.md │ │ │ ├── menudepth.md How to make menu collapsible. As you can see from the folder structure above, every root folders that are collapsible have an _index.md file. In that file, we define the menu to be collapsible.
